===============
OsensaNugrid
===============

Python module for interfacing with the OSENSA's Nugrid module.


*History*
---------
*Release 0.0.7:*

- Updated TEC setting function again with newer hardware changes

*Release 0.0.6:*

- More minor bug fixes, re-upload

*Release 0.0.5:*

- Updated TEC setpoint function based on experimentation, minor bug fixes

*Release 0.0.4:*

- Modified read_photodiode() to return the status bits instead of throw error

*Release 0.0.3:*

- Remove debug messages

*Release 0.0.2:*

- Changed globals
- Moved DAC setup to init

*Release 0.0.1:*

- Initial release
